CHANGELOG
=========

0.2.1 (2019-04-04)
------------------

* Fix verbose output reporting on Linux (`#7`_).

.. _#7: https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-subtests/issues/7

0.2.0 (2019-04-03)
------------------

* Sub tests are correctly reported with ``pytest-xdist>=1.28``.

0.1.0 (2019-04-01)
------------------

* First release to PyPI.
